venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Neuro Linguistic Programming is the study of how we think, communicate and behave.

NLP describes the fundamental dynamics between mind (neuro) and language (linguistic) and how their interplay affects our body and behavior (programming).

NLP is a way of enriching the choices that you have available in the world around you.

Tonight, learn some of the basic tenets of NLP. Practice using several very simple - yet ultra-powerful - NLP techniques that will help you create instant changes in your state of mind, body and emotions.

 

Facilitated by Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist.

 

For more information, visit: http://www.hypnosis.ws

 

Preregistration enrollment must be completed by noontime on April 26.

For more info, visit: http://www.localendar.com/public/km

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: An Evening of NLP: NeuroLinguistic Programming seminar
